channel.title: dev Boer Docs
channel.description: Recent content on dev Boer Docs

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo This wasn’t a fun experience. I don’t know 100% what I am because I could burnt out… I want a more complicated theme, but PaperMod and paper can do! I at least figured out github, github actions, and cloudflare pointing to github pages even with the help of a guide that left out some nuances. Nuance 1, I had to point this blog or docs site to blog.gh-pages-ip as A records and CNAME record to docs because it had to be different.

item.title: Jellyfin LXC Setup
item.description: Setting Jellyfin Up on Proxmox Metal install on unprivileged container Mount Points GPU Passthrough I do think this would be easier with a VM than an unprivileged container, however, I feel I had to with my limited resources. … to be continued. I gotta figure out how to implement images with markdown or allowing html.

item.title: Helloworld
item.description: Hello World echo "Hello World" console.log('hello world') I don’t know.. I’d like to share what I’ve learned through home-labbing! Hugo me the best!
